SEO.title: WB24 Platform — Vending Management Software
SEO.description: Real-time 24/7 software for managing your vending machine network. Track sales, control inventory, and receive instant notifications.
SEO.keywords: vending, vending management, telemetry, real-time monitoring, vending software, wb24

features.2: Online payment via QR or NFC
features.5: Management of all vending network types

Telemetry.title: Telemetry and management
Telemetry.description: Telemetry and management of vending equipment is used for monitoring both a single vending machine and large networks in various directions

EquipmentIntegration.title: Equipment
EquipmentIntegration.description: You can connect your equipment and integrate it via API or use a ready-made solution developed specifically for the service.
EquipmentIntegration.gsm_desc: module for exchange, management, and data transfer to the wb24.biz service
EquipmentIntegration.tft_desc: contactless reader and information/payment terminal for cashless payments with NFC/QR support, fiscalization, and receipt issuing
EquipmentIntegration.desc1_full: The Kit Box Master telemetry controller provides complete control and management of the vending machine, connection of the acquiring terminal and other equipment, cloud fiscalization of sales, and application of loyalty systems and promotions.
EquipmentIntegration.tft_full_desc: Can be both in an overhead case and built into the machine case. Connecting an acquiring terminal allows you to make payments via nfc/QR, fiscalize receipts displayed on the screen.

EquipmentDeviceDialog.title: GSM-wb24 Telemetry Module
EquipmentDeviceDialog.desc1: Module for data exchange, management and transmission to wb24.biz service
EquipmentDeviceDialog.desc1_full: GSM-wb24 telemetry module solves the task of complete control of the state and management of the vending machine, and data transmission to the wb24.biz service. Connecting an acquiring terminal and other equipment allows you to make payments via nfc/QR, fiscalize receipts displayed on the screen
EquipmentDeviceDialog.tft_desc: Contactless reader and information-payment terminal for cashless payments with NFC/QR support, fiscalization and receipt issuing
EquipmentDeviceDialog.tft_full_desc: Can be both in an overhead case and built into the machine case. Connecting an acquiring terminal allows you to make payments via nfc/QR, fiscalize receipts displayed on the screen.
EquipmentDeviceDialog.desc2: Supports vending protocols MDB, Executive (Price Holding and Standard), DEX/UCS, DDCMP and is compatible with more than 250 models of vending machines and coffee machines.

Footer.contact_title: If you have any questions or need additional information

FunctionalFeatures.title: Functional features
FunctionalFeatures.description: Manage temperature and respond in a timely manner to critical temperature changes and leaks on equipment

real-time.title: Track sales in real time
real-time.description: Stay up to date with sales volumes in real time to respond quickly to demand changes

inventory.title: Monitor product, consumables, and ingredient availability
inventory.description: Timely replenish consumables and ingredients to avoid downtime and increase sales

alerts.title: Track failures and emergency situations
alerts.description: Receive timely information about failures and emergencies for prompt resolution

security.title: Respond quickly to hacking and vandalism attempts
security.description: Security system enables quick response to hacking and vandalism attempts, ensuring your equipment's protection

remote.title: Change equipment settings remotely
remote.description: Change equipment settings remotely without visiting the location, saving time and resources

temperature-control.title: Manage temperature and react promptly to critical temperature changes and leaks in equipment
temperature-control.description: Heating or cooling of equipment/goods requires monitoring and remote control, and timely notification can prevent damage/deterioration

payment.title: Accept payments via acquiring system
payment.description: Accept payments through all available acquiring systems (Visa, MasterCard, Google Pay, Apple Pay)

fiscal.title: Fiscalize sales to meet local law requirements
fiscal.description: Heating or cooling of equipment/goods requires monitoring and remote control, and timely notification can prevent damage/deterioration

emergency-alerts.title: Receive notifications about all emergency and abnormal situations
emergency-alerts.description: Sales fiscalization and fiscal receipt issuance ensures compliance with legislation

service-alerts.title: Receive advance notifications about required service and product replenishment
service-alerts.description: Timely notifications in Telegram will allow you to respond quickly and reduce equipment downtime

analytics.title: Make decisions based on analysis of equipment operation statistics and sales volumes
analytics.description: Automated notifications, configured by the user, and timely service will keep the equipment running without stopping

access-control.title: Configure and restrict information access for partners and employees as you see fit
access-control.description: Network/equipment analytics helps make the right marketing decisions

remote-release.title: Remotely release goods in case of equipment failures
remote-release.description: Each user should only have access to information that matches their status and responsibilities

remote-restart.title: Remotely restart equipment in case of failures
remote-restart.description: In case of equipment failures, products can be released remotely in the required quantity, reducing customer dissatisfaction and improving competitive ranking

remote-update.title: Remote software updates
remote-update.description: If an error occurs that can only be fixed by rebooting the equipment, this can be done remotely

0.title: Free Plan
description: up to 100 days of order history storage
0.note: evaluate all features and pay nothing

1.title: Standard Plan
description: up to 12 months of order history storage

ConnectWithUsDialog.subtitle: If you have any questions or need more information
